definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
Planck's constant h, approximately equal to 6.626 x 10^-34 joule.seconds or 4.135 x 10^-15 electron volt.seconds

pinyin: A1 fu2 jia1 de2 luo2 chang2 shu4

sentences.english: This is the table of constants in its entirety.
sentences.chinese: 這是一張完整的常數表。

sentences.english: This is just some proportionality constant.
A new method has been used for calculation stability constants of metal com-plexes.
sentences.chinese: 提出了配合物穩定常數的一種新計算方法。

sentences.english: Well, if you look at all these hyperbola's, xy equals constant.
sentences.chinese: 如果你們看這裏所有的雙曲線的話，xy等於常數。

sentences.english: A method for determining both the optical constants and the thickness of thin films from transmission spectrum has been presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了確定透明均勻薄膜光學常數和厚度的方法。

sentences.english: O So this is constant time, order one.
And finally we have Planck's constant here, which we're all familiar with.
sentences.chinese: 最後這個是我們，都很熟悉的普朗克常數。

sentences.english: THE fundamental constants of physics are the numbers that describe just how strong the forces of nature are.
sentences.chinese: 物理學的基本常數，是用以描述自然中力的強度的量。

sentences.english: The recurrence formula of the time-constant of the sensor is also given.
sentences.chinese: 本文還提出了傳感器時間常數的實時遞推計算方法。

sentences.english: In this paper, the two dimensional Madelung constant for the NaCl type structure is calculated.
sentences.chinese: 本文對二維氯化鈉型結構的馬德隆常數進行求算。

sentences.english: And there is a constant out here.
The results from this equation of Karman constant agree with measured data.
sentences.chinese: 該卡門常數的理論公式與實測資料較爲吻合。

sentences.english: Increment real constant table number by RINC.

sentences.chinese: 我之後會得到一些常數。

sentences.english: Medium cost tower with small constant shooting range.
sentences.chinese: 中等成本塔與小常數射擊場。

definition: (math.) the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter (π)
to be neither too familiar nor too distant/to keep sb at arm's length
